name: Pork 2
description:
Pork 2 is a parody of Zork II and a sequel to Pork I: The Great Underground Sewer System. A distraught waitress working at the Cajuin Fried Chicken House explains to the player that a unusual large Chicken Gizzard escaped from the Chicken House and is now terrorizing the neighborhood as a tap dancer at the local Burlesque house.

The player must now do something about the Chicken Gizzard before everyone goes crazy. When the game starts, it continues on from where Pork I ended. The player is at the bottom of a deep crevice right beside the house where Pork I started.

As a classic text adventure there is no graphics and no sound. The game features a special lewd mode that can be accessed by answering some questions.

shot.caption: Looks like I need to get up
